about.title: About the Lawyer
about.subtitle: Serhii Proidak
about.description: Young, energetic, and goal-oriented lawyer for whom each case is a challenge and an opportunity to prove his expertise. I work quickly, precisely, and with maximum focus on results, using modern approaches to defense and the latest legal tools.
about.descriptionPart2: My advantage is the combination of a fresh perspective and solid knowledge. I am not afraid of complex situations and always look for non-standard solutions to provide the client with the best possible outcome.
about.descriptionPart3: It is important to me that each client feels supported and confident about tomorrow.
about.educationText: Yaroslav Mudryi National Law University, specialty "Jurisprudence"
about.qualificationText: Qualification and Disciplinary Commission of the Bar, certificate of the right to practice law
about.professionalismText: Modern approaches to defense and the latest legal tools
about.confidentialityText: Guarantee of complete confidentiality of client information
about.individualApproachText: Non-standard solutions for the best results

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing and protecting information about individuals that may be obtained when using the website of the Law Office of Serhii Proidak. We respect your right to privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine.

section2.title: 2. Collection and Use of Personal Data
section2.content: We collect personal data that you voluntarily provide to us through the feedback forms on the website, including name, phone number, and email address. This data is used exclusively to contact you and provide legal advice or services that you request.

section3.title: 3. Protection of Personal Data
section3.content: We take all necessary technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Only authorized employees of the law office, who are obliged to maintain confidentiality, have access to your personal data.

section4.title: 4. Disclosure of Information to Third Parties
section4.content: We do not transfer your personal data to third parties without your consent, except in cases provided for by the legislation of Ukraine. The law office guarantees compliance with attorney-client privilege in accordance with the Law of Ukraine 'On Advocacy and Legal Practice'.

section5.title: 5. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section5.content: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. Any changes will be published on this page. We recommend periodically reviewing this Policy to stay informed of any changes.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our clients

item1.question: How long does the first consultation take?
item1.answer: The first consultation usually takes about 1 hour. During the consultation, we will discuss your situation in detail and determine the best strategy to protect your interests.

item2.question: How much do attorney services cost?
item2.answer: The cost of services depends on the complexity of your case and the amount of work required. After the first consultation, I will be able to provide you with detailed information about the cost of services.

item3.question: Can I get an online consultation?
item3.answer: Yes, I provide online consultations via Zoom, Skype, or other platforms convenient for you. This is convenient for clients who cannot visit my office in person.

item4.question: How quickly can you take on my case?
item4.answer: I try to take on new cases as quickly as possible. Usually, we can start working within 1-3 days after the first consultation and signing the contract.

item5.question: What documents should I prepare for the first consultation?
item5.answer: For the first consultation, it is advisable to have all documents related to your case: contracts, correspondence, court documents, etc. This will help me better understand your situation and provide the most effective consultation.
